tgt_original: tathāgato'rhan samyaksambuddha ityebhistribhiḥ padaiḥ śāstṛtvasampadaṃ darśayati |
tatra yathaiva te dharmā vyavasthitāstathaiva gadanāttathā dharmadaiśikatvādvaktṛtvasampaduktā |
tatrārīn hatavānarhannityanena prahāṇasampaduktā |  arayaśca rāgādayaḥ kleśāḥ sarvakuśaladharmopaghātārthena |

tadevamaviparītadharmadaiśikatvena sarvakleśaprahāṇena sarvākāradharmāvabodhena ca śāstṛtvasampadasādhāraṇā paripūrṇā ca bhagavataḥ kathitā  tathāhi na bāhyānāmaviparītadharmadaiśikatvaprāptiḥ |  sarvakleśāprahāṇāt |
śrāvakapratyekabuddhāstu yadyapi bhūtaśāstāraḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇānna tu sarvākāraśāstāraḥ sarvākārasarvadharmānavabodhāt |
bhagavān punaryathoktanyāyena bhūtaśāstā sarvākāraśāstā ceti pratipāditam |  yena sā śāstṛtvasampallabhyate taddarśayati |
vidyācaraṇasampanna iti |  anena śāstṛtvasampadaḥ prāptihetu darśayati |
tathā hyātmaviparyāsena bāhyavītarāgā na śobhanaṃ gatāḥ |
sugataḥ surūpavat |  apunarāvṛttyā vā suṣṭhugataḥ sugataḥ sunaṣṭajvaravat |  niḥśeṣaṃ vā gataḥ sugataḥ suparipūrṇaghaṭavat |
tathā hi bhagavāṃstriḥkṛtvo rātrestriḥkṛtvo divasasya buddhacakṣuṣā lokaṃ vyavalokayati ko hīyate ko vardhata ityādibhirākārairdvitīyaṃ bhavyavinayanaṃ karma darśayati |
